ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Should pets be given weapons above level 20?
ygData.msgSnippet: People people DELAY DOES NOT MATTER.  No matter what weapon the delay of any npc is 30 so say at level 24 your pet hits for 22 but if you give it a fs 2h and
ygData.messageBody:
People people DELAY DOES NOT MATTER. No matter what weapon the delay of any
npc is 30 so say at level 24 your pet hits for 22 but if you give it a fs 2h
and it hits for 24 but has a delay of 40 it doesnt matter the delay is
automatically 30. They had to do this a while ago cause necros used to get
there pets delay down to like 9 with augment death and a fs dagger thats 3 19
cause if the damage is lower then then what your pet does it doesnt matter
either you cant have a negative effect from giving your pet a weapon so go
nuts.

Xurtin Shadowreaver
Retired 50 necromancer
GNOME
